articles.title: Readers push back on ChatGPT use in Massachusetts executive branch
articles.description:
A majority of respondents were against the decision — "Read the room. We don't want this."

The post Readers push back on ChatGPT use in Massachusetts executive branch appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Majority of respondents oppose ChatGPT use in Massachusetts executive branch.
Survey indicates 70% of readers disapprove of AI integration in government.
Concerns raised about transparency and accountability in local governance.

articles.title: Hillary Clinton testifies she has no information on Epstein’s crimes and doesn’t recall meeting him
articles.description:
“I had no idea about their criminal activities. I do not recall ever encountering Mr. Epstein,” Clinton said in an opening statement she shared on social media.

The post Hillary Clinton testifies she has no information on Epstein’s crimes and doesn’t recall meeting him appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Hillary Clinton testified she has no knowledge of Jeffrey Epstein's criminal activities.
Clinton stated she does not recall ever meeting Epstein during her testimony.
Her statements may influence public perception of political figures in Boston.

articles.title: What a traveling nurse experienced on the hard-hit Cape after Monday’s blizzard
articles.description:
The Cape is still recovering after the massive winter storm; thousands remain without power.

The post What a traveling nurse experienced on the hard-hit Cape after Monday’s blizzard appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Thousands of Cape residents remain without power following Monday's blizzard.
A traveling nurse reported significant challenges in providing care amid the storm's aftermath.
Local recovery efforts are ongoing, impacting healthcare access for Boston area residents.
